statements: SELECT * FROM roles WHERE id = 1;
SELECT role_name, permissions FROM roles WHERE id > 10;
SELECT * FROM roles WHERE role_name = 'admin';
SELECT id, role_name FROM roles WHERE id BETWEEN 5 AND 10;
SELECT * FROM roles ORDER BY role_name DESC;
SELECT * FROM roles WHERE id = 1;
SELECT role_name, permissions FROM roles WHERE id = 2;
SELECT * FROM roles WHERE permissions @> '{"read": true}' ORDER BY id DESC;
SELECT role_name, id FROM roles WHERE role_name = 'Admin' AND permissions @> '{"write": true}' ORDER BY id ASC;
SELECT * FROM roles WHERE role_name LIKE 'Dev%' OR id BETWEEN 3 AND 5;
SELECT * FROM users;
SELECT username FROM users WHERE role = 'admin';
SELECT id, username FROM users ORDER BY id DESC;
SELECT id, permission_name FROM permissions WHERE id > 5;
SELECT * FROM users JOIN permissions ON users.id = permissions.id;
SELECT * FROM users WHERE id = 1;
SELECT username, role FROM users WHERE role = 'admin';
SELECT * FROM permissions WHERE id IN (1, 2, 3);
SELECT permission_name, description FROM permissions WHERE id = 1 OR id = 3;
SELECT id, username, role, permission_name FROM users INNER JOIN permissions ON users.id = permissions.id;
SELECT * FROM users WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT username, role FROM users WHERE role = 'admin';
SELECT user_id, username, role FROM users WHERE role = 'user';
SELECT * FROM users WHERE username LIKE '%smith%';
SELECT user_id, role FROM users WHERE role LIKE '%er';
SELECT * FROM users WHERE role = 'admin';
SELECT user_id, username FROM users WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT role_name, COUNT(*) FROM roles GROUP BY role_name;
SELECT user_id, username, role_name FROM users JOIN roles ON users.role = roles.role_name;
SELECT u.username, r.role_name, p.permission_name FROM users u JOIN roles r ON u.role = r.role_name JOIN permissions p ON r.role_name = p.permission_name;
SELECT * FROM users;
SELECT user_id, username FROM users ORDER BY user_id DESC;
SELECT username, role FROM users WHERE role='admin';
SELECT user_id, role_id FROM user_roles WHERE user_id=1;
SELECT * FROM permissions WHERE permission_name LIKE '%read%';
SELECT * FROM users WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT username, role FROM users WHERE role = 'Admin';
SELECT user_id, username, role FROM users WHERE role = 'User' ORDER BY user_id DESC;
SELECT u.username, r.role_name FROM users u JOIN roles r ON u.role = r.role_id;

SELECT u.username, r.role_name, p.permission_name FROM users u JOIN roles r ON u.role = r.role_id LEFT JOIN user_roles ur ON u.user_id = ur.user_id LEFT JOIN permissions p ON ur.role_id = p.permission_id WHERE u.username LIKE 'J%';
SELECT * FROM users;
SELECT username, role_id FROM users WHERE role_id = 1;
SELECT user_id, username FROM users ORDER BY username DESC;
SELECT role_name, permissions->>'read' FROM roles WHERE role_id = 2;

SELECT u.username, r.role_name, p.permission_name FROM users u JOIN user_roles ur ON u.user_id = ur.user_id JOIN roles r ON ur.role_id = r.role_id JOIN role_permissions rp ON r.role_id = rp.role_id JOIN permissions p ON rp.permission_id = p.permission_id WHERE u.user_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM users WHERE role_id = 1;
SELECT username, role_id FROM users WHERE user_id = 5;
SELECT users.username, roles.role_name FROM users JOIN roles ON users.role_id = roles.role_id;
SELECT user_id, username, role_name FROM users JOIN roles ON users.role_id = roles.role_id WHERE role_name = 'Admin';

SELECT users.username, roles.role_name, permissions.permission_name FROM users JOIN user_roles ON users.user_id = user_roles.user_id JOIN roles ON user_roles.role_id = roles.role_id JOIN role_permissions ON roles.role_id = role_permissions.role_id JOIN permissions ON role_permissions.permission_id = permissions.permission_id WHERE users.user_id = 1;
